selector.description: All elements

selector.name: #id
selector.description: The element with id="lastname"

selector.name: .class
selector.description: All elements with class="intro"

selector.name: .class,.class
selector.description: All elements with the class "intro" or "demo"

selector.name: element
selector.description: All <p> elements

selector.name: el1,el2,el3
selector.description: All <h1>, <div> and <p> elements

selector.name: :first
selector.description: The first <p> element

selector.name: :last
selector.description: The last <p> element

selector.name: :even
selector.description: All even <tr> elements

selector.name: :odd
selector.description: All odd <tr> elements

selector.name: :first-child
selector.description: All <p> elements that are the first child of their parent

selector.name: :first-of-type
selector.description: All <p> elements that are the first <p> element of their parent

selector.name: :last-child
selector.description: All <p> elements that are the last child of their parent

selector.name: :last-of-type
selector.description: All <p> elements that are the last <p> element of their parent

selector.name: :nth-child(n)
selector.description: All <p> elements that are the 2nd child of their parent

selector.name: :nth-last-child(n)
selector.description: All <p> elements that are the 2nd child of their parent, counting from the last child

selector.name: :nth-of-type(n)
selector.description: All <p> elements that are the 2nd <p> element of their parent

selector.name: :nth-last-of-type(n)
selector.description: All <p> elements that are the 2nd <p> element of their parent, counting from the last child

selector.name: :only-child
selector.description: All <p> elements that are the only child of their parent

selector.name: :only-of-type
selector.description: All <p> elements that are the only child, of its type, of their parent

selector.name: parent > child
selector.description: All <p> elements that are a direct child of a <div> element

selector.name: parent descendant
selector.description: All <p> elements that are descendants of a <div> element

selector.name: element + next
selector.description: The <p> element that are next to each <div> elements

selector.name: element ~ siblings
selector.description: All <p> elements that appear after the <div> element

selector.name: :eq(index)
selector.description: The fourth element in a list (index starts at 0)

selector.name: :gt(no)
selector.description: List elements with an index greater than 3

selector.name: :lt(no)
selector.description: List elements with an index less than 3

selector.name: :not(selector)
selector.description: All input elements that are not empty

selector.name: :header
selector.description: All header elements <h1>, <h2> ...

selector.name: :animated
selector.description: All animated elements

selector.name: :focus
selector.description: The element that currently has focus

selector.name: :contains(text)
selector.description: All elements which contains the text "Hello"

selector.name: :has(selector)
selector.description: All <div& elements that have a <p> element

selector.name: :empty
selector.description: All elements that are empty

selector.name: :parent
selector.description: All elements that are a parent of another element

selector.name: :hidden
selector.description: All hidden <p> elements

selector.name: :visible
selector.description: All visible tables

selector.name: :root
selector.description: The document's root element

selector.name: :lang(language)
selector.description: All <p> elements with a lang attribute value starting with "de"

selector.name: [attribute]
selector.description: All elements with a href attribute

selector.name: [attribute=value]
selector.description: All elements with a href attribute value equal to "default.htm"

selector.name: [attribute!=value]
selector.description: All elements with a href attribute value not equal to "default.htm"

selector.name: [attribute$=value]
selector.description: All elements with a href attribute value ending with ".jpg"

selector.name: [attribute|=value]
selector.description: All elements with a title attribute value equal to 'Tomorrow', or starting with 'Tomorrow' followed by a hyphen

selector.name: [attribute^=value]
selector.description: All elements with a title attribute value starting with "Tom"

selector.name: [attribute~=value]
selector.description: All elements with a title attribute value containing the specific word "hello"

selector.name: [attribute*=value]
selector.description: All elements with a title attribute value containing the word "hello"

selector.name: :input
selector.description: All input elements

selector.name: :text
selector.description: All input elements with type="text"

selector.name: :password
selector.description: All input elements with type="password"

selector.name: :radio
selector.description: All input elements with type="radio"

selector.name: :checkbox
selector.description: All input elements with type="checkbox"

selector.name: :submit
selector.description: All input elements with type="submit"

selector.name: :reset
selector.description: All input elements with type="reset"

selector.name: :button
selector.description: All input elements with type="button"

selector.name: :image
selector.description: All input elements with type="image"

selector.name: :file
selector.description: All input elements with type="file"

selector.name: :enabled
selector.description: All enabled input elements

selector.name: :disabled
selector.description: All disabled input elements

selector.name: :selected
selector.description: All selected input elements

selector.name: :checked
selector.description: All checked input elements
